DOC.brief_summary: Single center investigator initiate sponsored Guidant Boston Scientific Corp. evaluate benefit ventricular rate regularization ( VRR ) patient congestive heart failure ( CHF ) significant atrial fibrillation ( AF ) burden .
DOC.brief_title: Ventricular Rate Regularization Improved Quality Life Patients With CHF AF
DOC.criteria: Be 1885 year old Be willing able give inform consent Patient currently CRTD ICD > 20 % atrial fibrillation burden record defibrillator follow report history atrial fibrillation prior implant . Patient ability complete Six minute walk test limiting factor fatigue shortness breath . Expected mortality less 6 month due noncardiac cause . Pregnant woman . Creatinine great equal 2.5 mg/dl . Anemia ( HCT less 30 ) COPD cause significant dyspnea Orthopedic problem affect 6 minute walk .
